name: Minigun Mimi 1: Ant Invasion
description:
High graphics mode is a bit buggy, pls use the low graphics mode

Minigun Mimi needs luck on her side in order to help her take down the cruel army of badass ants!

Every 15 seconds, you may choose 1 upgrade: Player or Enemy speed, Fire rate, bullet speed, and even field of view!

However, you must then roll 2 dice to decide whether the upgrade choice is in your favour, or if it's in the enemies!

WASD to Move

Left Shift/Space to Dash

R to Restart
